Transcription for 29017

Up ahead is Common Place Farm. This is the home of Dairy Dreams Ice Cream, made here
since 2004. All the ice cream is made fresh on the farm from their own dairy herd who
graze the fields about you. It has an ice cream parlour that is open every day through
the summer, so, if you think you've worked up an appetite for a delicious ice cream en
route, why not call in?
